      The angle between the detector's local coordinate system's z-axis and the sector coordinate system's z-axis.

      static double L1PCalVW 
      static int numDoublePaddlesPCalU 
      static int numDoublePaddlesPCalVW
      For the v- and w- views, paddles #1-15 (the shortest paddles) are grouped into adjacent pairs, and each pair is attached a single PMT, while paddles #16-62 (the longer paddles) are each individually attached to a single PMT.
      static int numPaddlesEC 
      static int numPaddlesPCalU
      The total number of scintillator paddles.

      static int numSinglePaddlesPCalU
      For the u-view, paddles #1-52 (the shortest paddles) are each individually attached to a single PMT, while paddles #53-68 (the longer paddles) are grouped into adjacent pairs, and each pair is attached a single PMT.

      • numSinglePaddlesPCalU

        public static final int numSinglePaddlesPCalU
        For the u-view, paddles #1-52 (the shortest paddles) are each individually attached to a single PMT, while paddles #53-68 (the longer paddles) are grouped into adjacent pairs, and each pair is attached a single PMT.
        See Also:

      • numDoublePaddlesPCalVW

        public static final int numDoublePaddlesPCalVW
        For the v- and w- views, paddles #1-15 (the shortest paddles) are grouped into adjacent pairs, and each pair is attached a single PMT, while paddles #16-62 (the longer paddles) are each individually attached to a single PMT.
        See Also:
